Became passionate about computer networks and racked up a few internships under my belt

work.title: Intern
work.description: Worked on Digital Mobile Radio (DMR), programming and commissioning two way radios for wireless communication of Tamil Nadu State Government ● Trained personnel in using the DMR and troubleshooting issues that may arise when using the equipment

work.title: Intern
work.description: Analyzed an IMS based communication solution for the Indian Army and for deploying a Unified Network Management System to manage the network ● Programmed a tool using python to detect if a supplied video was out of focus or blurry which can be deployed in CCTV monitoring software to detect tampering with cameras

work.title: Software Development Intern
work.description: Augmented an in-house software with rundeck functionality using the Rundeck API on PHP

work.title: Intern
work.description: Responsible for the planning and upgrading  the office network infrastructure and ensuring protection against threats, both internal and external

work.title: Software Development Intern
work.description: Built an application using the Eldos Callback Filter to track changes to files in an operating system ● Created an application to rollback changes occuring in the filesystem

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
